text: (aaj yeh duniya ki zindagi mein mast hain) aur jis roz Allah inko ikattha karega to (yahi duniya ki zindagi inhein aisi mehsoos hogi) goya yeh mehaz ek ghadi bhar aapas mein jaan pehchan karne ko thehre thay . (Us waqt tehqeeq ho jayega ke) fil-waqey sakht ghatey (nuksan) mein rahey woh log jinhon ne Allah ki mulaqaat ko jhutlaya aur hargiz woh raah e raast par na thay
